Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Changbaishan International Hotel in Beijing (North Chaoyang), you'll be close to Lady Street and Ditan Park. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of North Star Shopping Mall and Beijing International Convention Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 221 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, a hair salon, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Beijing? This hotel has facilities measuring 8339 square feet (775 square meters), including meeting rooms.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Changbaishan International Hotel in Beijing (North Chaoyang), you'll be close to Lady Street and Ditan Park. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of North Star Shopping Mall and Beijing International Convention Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lady Street - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Ditan Park - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
North Star Shopping Mall - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Beijing International Convention Center - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Lama Temple - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Olympic Sports Center - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Temple of Confucius - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
The Imperial College - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
National Agricultural Exhibition Center - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
National Stadium - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Tiandi Theater - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Poly Theater - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
798 Space - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Nali Patio - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Workers Stadium - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi

The preferred airport for Changbaishan International Hotel is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 17.3 km / 10.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
